ul.li: Data records are semi-binary, and not human readable textual (like i.e. *.version are.)
Only Data record for configuration tables can be packaged, not company data.
Data records containing back slash character "\" cannot be extracted from database. For instance: F.BATCH!BNK\AA.EOD.PROCESS.d
Local Tables: New Local Tables are not directly supported. Please use data records (*.d) to extract them from the database.
